Earn ₦750K With YouTube Automation & Content Creation in 8 Weeks

Sounds unbelievable? It’s 100% possible! You don’t need a laptop, expensive camera, or even to appear on video to build a profitable, automated YouTube channel. With just your smartphone and the right system, you can create viral content, grow multiple channels, and start earning ₦700,000+ monthly—all without recording a single video yourself!

Think YouTube is too complicated? Too competitive? Too technical? Think again! Whether you’re a complete beginner or someone looking for a hands-off income stream, this course will walk you through the exact steps to create, automate, and monetize YouTube channels—even if you’re starting from scratch!

Let's Get Started

Here's Why You NEED
to Act NOW!

Our YouTube Automation & Content Creation Mastery Program is designed to help ANYONE—whether you’re a student, freelancer, job seeker, or aspiring YouTuber—earn ₦700,000+ monthly by mastering high-demand content creation and automation strategies that successful YouTube entrepreneurs are using today.

It doesn’t matter if:

  • You don’t want to show your face or record videos (we’ll teach you faceless YouTube automation strategies!)
  • You don’t know where to find video ideas or content (we’ll show you how to generate unlimited viral content!)
  • You don’t have expensive video editing software (we’ll teach you how to edit videos using free and mobile-friendly tools!).
  • You don’t have expensive video editing software (we’ll teach you how to edit videos using free and mobile-friendly tools!).
Enroll Now

Where You Can Make Money After Training:

Why This Course is Worth ₦800,000

YouTube Automation Business Model

Learn how to set up & scale faceless YouTube channels without recording videos.

Finding Viral Video Topics

Learn how to identify trends, research winning niches, and create content that attracts millions of views.

Scriptwriting & AI Content Generation

Learn how to use ChatGPT & AI tools to create viral video scripts in minutes.

Voiceovers & Text-to-Speech Automation

Learn how to use AI-generated voices and professional narration without recording yourself.

Video Editing & Production Without Filming

Master CapCut, Eleven Labs, Canva, and online video tools to create high-quality faceless videos.

SEO & YouTube Growth Strategies

Learn how to rank videos on YouTube, write compelling titles & descriptions, and maximize watch time.

Monetization & Revenue Streams

Discover how to make money from YouTube ads, affiliate marketing, sponsorships, and automation.

Freelancing & Outsourcing Strategies

Learn how to outsource video editing, scriptwriting, and voiceovers to scale multiple channels without doing the work yourself.

Enroll Now

who is this For?

1

Aspiring YouTubers & Digital Entrepreneurs

Learn how to grow and monetize YouTube channels without showing your face.

2

Social Media Managers & Influencers

Gain professional skills in YouTube content strategy, automation, and monetization.

3

Students & Fresh Graduates Who Want a High-Paying Skill

Learn a future-proof digital skill that is in high demand worldwide.

4

Freelancers Who Want to Earn More

Expand your services and start charging premium rates for YouTube automation and content creation.

Enroll Now

The Price? Practically a Giveaway

We’ve priced this course at ₦800,000 because that’s what it’s truly worth, but here’s the deal:

  • If you enroll TODAY, you’ll pay just ₦500,000!
  • Pay within 12 hours, and we’ll further slash it to ₦150,000 ONLY!

That’s a ₦650,000 discount—a small investment for the skills that can set you up for a lifetime of success. 

Offer Ends in

Days

Enroll Now

we’re here to Answer all your questions

Do I need prior experience in content creation or video editing?

No! This course is beginner-friendly and designed for people with zero experience in video creation, editing, or YouTube strategy. You will learn everything step by step, from finding viral video topics to monetization.

 

Do I need a laptop for this training?

No! You can create, manage, and automate YouTube channels using just your smartphone. We will teach you how to use mobile-friendly apps to create videos, generate voiceovers, and edit content without needing expensive equipment.

 

How long will it take before I can start making money?

This is an 8-week structured program, and by the end of the training, you’ll be able to create, optimize, and monetize YouTube channels effectively. However, your earnings depend on how quickly you apply the strategies and scale your channel.

Will I receive a certificate after completing the course?

Yes! You will receive a recognized digital certificate that you can use to apply for YouTube content creation jobs, freelance gigs, or start your own YouTube business.

don't Miss Out
Act Now !!!!

This offer is STRICTLY for action-takers. The ₦150,000 discount is only valid for those who sign up TODAY.

  • The price will revert to ₦800,000 after 24 hours.
  • Only 30 slots are available to ensure personalized attention.
